froggy:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
froggy:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

froggy:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
froggy:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
froggy:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

froggy:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
froggy:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

froggy:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
froggy:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !froggy:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

froggy:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
froggy:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !froggy:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
